definitions.definition: Any of several birds of prey in the genus Circus of the subfamily Circinae which fly low over meadows and marshes and hunt small mammals or birds.
A runner, specifically, a cross country runner.
A kind of dog used to hunt hares; a harehound .

secondary_definitions: Any of several birds of prey in the genus Circus of the subfamily Circinae which fly low over meadows and marshes and hunt small mammals or birds.
A runner, specifically, a cross country runner.
A kind of dog used to hunt hares; a harehound .
